properties.name: code
properties.description: the invite code (unique ID)

properties.name: guild
properties.description: the guild this invite is for

properties.name: channel
properties.description: the channel this invite is for

properties.name: inviter
properties.description: the user who created the invite

properties.name: target_type
properties.description: the type of target for this voice channel invite

properties.name: target_user
properties.description: the user whose stream to display for this voice channel stream invite

properties.name: target_application
properties.description: the embedded application to open for this voice channel embedded application invite

properties.name: approximate_presence_count
properties.description: approximate count of online members, returned from the GET /invites/<code> endpoint when with_counts is true

properties.name: approximate_member_count
properties.description: approximate count of total members, returned from the GET /invites/<code> endpoint when with_counts is true

properties.name: expires_at
properties.description: the expiration date of this invite, returned from the GET /invites/<code> endpoint when with_expiration is true

properties.name: stage_instance
properties.description: stage instance data if there is a public Stage instance in the Stage channel this invite is for

properties.name: guild_scheduled_event
properties.description: guild scheduled event data, only included if guild_scheduled_event_id contains a valid guild scheduled event id

properties.name: uses
properties.description: number of times this invite has been used

properties.name: max_uses
properties.description: max number of times this invite can be used

properties.name: max_age
properties.description: duration (in seconds) after which the invite expires

properties.name: temporary
properties.description: whether this invite only grants temporary membership

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: when this invite was created

properties.name: members
properties.description: the members speaking in the Stage

properties.name: participant_count
properties.description: the number of users in the Stage

properties.name: speaker_count
properties.description: the number of users speaking in the Stage

properties.name: topic
properties.description: the topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)
